name: Retail Deposit
description: Provides comprehensive deposit services for individual customers, including various product types such as demand deposits, time deposits, and savings deposits.

overview.summary: Retail deposit products offer end-to-end personal deposit service solutions, covering full lifecycle functions including account management, product configuration, payment settlement, risk control, and data analysis.

modules.name: Retail Deposit Core
modules.description: Provides core functions for deposit business, including core capabilities such as account management, product management, interest rate management, and transaction processing.

functions.title: Account Full Lifecycle Management
functions.description: Manages the full lifecycle of bank customer accounts, including core functions like account structure management, opening, closing, info maintenance, status control, permission setup, and relationship handling.

functions.title: Customer Account Opening
functions.description: Supports individual customer account opening, including identity verification and information entry.

functions.title: Customer Information Maintenance
functions.description: Supports functions like modifying basic customer information and updating contact details.

functions.title: Account Status Management
functions.description: Supports status change operations like account freezing, unfreezing, and closure.

functions.title: Product Full Lifecycle Management
functions.description: Responsible for the full lifecycle management of deposit products, achieving standardized management, supporting demand and term products, including product design, parameter setup, and activation/deactivation control.

functions.title: Product Configuration
functions.description: Supports parameterized configuration of deposit products, including interest rates, terms, and minimum deposit amounts.

functions.title: Interest Rate Model Management
functions.description: Supports differentiated customer interest rate models, including board rates, product rates, customer group rates, and individual customer rates.

functions.title: Interest Rate Setup
functions.description: Supports differentiated customer interest rate models, including board rates, product rates, customer group rates, and individual customer rates.

functions.title: Interest Rate Adjustment
functions.description: Supports dynamic interest rate adjustments and historical record inquiries.

functions.title: Tax Rule Management
functions.description: Flexibly supports tax rule configuration, including tax and tax exemption rules, with automated tax processing.

functions.title: Fee Rule Management
functions.description: Manages the configuration of account service fees, transaction fees, automated fee collection, and error handling processes.

functions.title: Multi-Level Transaction Control
functions.description: Supports multi-level account control and transaction restrictions by customer, account, and card; allows account freezing; supports multi-dimensional transaction restrictions based on channel, product, and scenario.

functions.title: Core Transaction Processing
functions.description: Completes core deposit transactions including deposits, withdrawals, transfers, and reversals, ensuring real-time and accurate accounting.

functions.title: Multi-Dimensional Inquiry Service
functions.description: Provides multi-dimensional query services for account balances, transaction history, and product details; supports real-time and historical data retrieval.

functions.title: Internal Account System Management
functions.description: Sets up an internal account system within the deposit system to facilitate settlement or clearing for external systems.

functions.title: Full Business Scenario Accounting
functions.description: Executes accounting for all business scenarios, subject balance checks, end-of-day batch processing, and automated generation of regulatory reports.

functions.title: Batch File Processing
functions.description: Provides the capability for batch handling of deposit core online reconciliation files and batch deduction files.

modules.name: Retail Deposit Products
modules.description: Provides functions for the design, configuration, and management of deposit products, supporting a flexible product factory model.

functions.title: Product Template Management
functions.description: Maintains a standardized deposit product template library; supports parameterized configurations like rate structure, term rules, and interest calculation methods; enables rapid combination and release of new products.

functions.title: Product Management
functions.description: Creates, maintains, and releases deposit products, including account structures, deposit agreements, and opening/closing rules.

functions.title: Parameter Management
functions.description: Supports adding, modifying, deleting, and exporting public and product parameters, including but not limited to currency, opening institution, opening channel, and deposit rates.

functions.title: Agreement Management
functions.description: Queries, maintains, and releases deposit agreements, which include interest, fee, and tax rules.

functions.title: Extended Functions
functions.description: Supports adding, deleting, and querying custom fields across modules like customer, account, sub-account, product, and agreement.

functions.title: Simulator
functions.description: Built-in product yield calculator and sandbox testing environment; supports interest sensitivity analysis, cash flow simulation, and pre-generation of regulatory report data.

functions.title: Business Process Template
functions.description: Provides templates for processes like account opening, closing, transfer, and account status inquiries.

functions.title: Work Order Management
functions.description: Manages full-process work orders (account opening, changes, transfers, etc.) for deposit business.

functions.title: Business Security
functions.description: Provides general components such as transaction deduplication and business frequency management.

functions.title: Customer Agreement Management
functions.description: Configures, queries, and modifies customer agreements.

functions.title: Deposit Certificate
functions.description: Generates standardized electronic deposit certificates, integrates with local e-signature, supports instant online download.

functions.title: Notification
functions.description: Triggers multi-channel notifications based on event-driven architecture, configurable message templates, and sending rules.

functions.title: Product Shelf
functions.description: Maintains multi-dimensional labeling system for deposit products, enabling smart recommendations, channel-specific pricing, and flexible regional sales strategies.

functions.title: Custom Forms
functions.description: Low-code component for configurable custom forms; supports CRUD services; enables rapid iteration during process changes without code modifications.

functions.title: Grayscale Management
functions.description: Component for traffic-tiered strategy in business feature releases; supports A/B testing, exception fallback, and fast version rollback, ensuring smooth business iteration.

modules.name: Payment
modules.description: Provides comprehensive payment solutions, including unified payment and SWIFT international payment services.

functions.title: Channel Configuration
functions.description: Manages access parameters, protocol conversions, and health maintenance for payment channels; supports dynamic expansion and failover across bank/third-party payment channels.

functions.title: Product Configuration
functions.description: Defines basic attributes (fees/limits/applicable scenarios) of payment products, enabling quick integration.

functions.title: Strategy Configuration
functions.description: Sets intelligent routing strategies (cost/success priority), risk control rules, and fund pooling strategies to dynamically optimize payment flow selection.

functions.title: Transaction Engine
functions.description: Executes protocol parsing, routing distribution, transaction state machine control, and exception handling for payment requests, ensuring atomic operations under high concurrency.

functions.title: Monitoring
functions.description: Tracks key metrics like transaction success rate, response time, and channel load in real time; configures threshold alarms and fallback mechanisms.

functions.title: Reconciliation
functions.description: Automatically performs reconciliation with channels, merchant settlements, and error handling.

functions.title: Position Management
functions.description: Manages user-held clearing balances; provides position reporting, occupation, usage inquiry, monitoring, and allocation functions.

functions.title: Transaction Management
functions.description: Handles business activities related to payment transactions or SWIFT message queries, modifications, cancellations, or confirmations between the bank's internal system and counterpart financial institutions, mainly through SWIFT MT and camt messages.

functions.title: Message Management
functions.description: Includes functions like message parsing, assembly, creation, sending, receiving, routing, querying, printing, and statistics.

functions.title: Integration Management
functions.description: Provides business integration with related systems, handling outgoing messages initiated by internal systems and incoming messages from the external message platform.

functions.title: Reconciliation Processing
functions.description: Provides management of account bank statements, reconciliation between account bank statements and clearing transactions, inquiry of reconciliation results, and reconciliation between clearing transactions and the core system ledger.

modules.name: Ops Management
modules.description: Responsible for the daily operations and process management of deposit business, ensuring efficient and stable business operations.

functions.title: Ledger Transaction
functions.description: Handles atomic operations for deposit account fund payments, supports core transaction types like transfers and reversals.

functions.title: Account Management
functions.description: Manages the full lifecycle of deposit accounts (opening, closing, changes).

functions.title: Inquiry
functions.description: Provides real-time inquiries for account balances, transaction history, detailed historical records; supports multi-condition search and report export.

functions.title: Transaction Control
functions.description: Maintains control code management, account freezing, unfreezing, and freeze extensions.

functions.title: Limit Management
functions.description: Configures daily and per-transaction limits at account/customer levels; supports differentiated limit strategies by channel and dynamic limit adjustments.

functions.title: Interest Management
functions.description: Handles interest rate changes and inquiries.

functions.title: Internal Account Management
functions.description: Supports internal account opening, closing, and inquiries.

functions.title: Fee Management
functions.description: Defines rules for account management fees and transaction fees; supports differentiated rate configurations and periodic automatic deductions.

functions.title: Parameter Management
functions.description: Maintains parameters such as holiday calendars.

functions.title: Teller Management
functions.description: Controls teller operation permissions (roles, institutions, business scope), password strategies, and operation log audits, building a secure permission matrix.

functions.title: Outbound Business
functions.description: Enables tellers to input and submit outbound remittance information and query related details.

functions.title: Parameter Management
functions.description: Maintains SWIFT BIC codes, RMA codes, account bank parameters, GPI status codes, etc.

functions.title: Transaction Management
functions.description: Manages transaction-type messages related to outbound remittance, including queries, initiation, and handling, covering MT199, MT195, MT196, etc.

functions.title: Message Management
functions.description: Provides queries for the original content of messages.

functions.title: Clearing Queue
functions.description: Allows viewing and reprocessing of queued outbound messages when conditions are met.

functions.title: Exception Management
functions.description: Provides details on exception transaction flows.

functions.title: GPI Management
functions.description: Provides details on GPI remittance messages requiring manual feedback.

functions.title: Reconciliation Management
functions.description: Manages reconciliation queries and processing, including statement list queries, incoming message list, date switch list, detailed statement transactions, balance checks, reconciliation steps, miscellaneous queries, error lists, and non-final order lists.

modules.name: Risk Management
modules.description: Provides risk identification, assessment, monitoring, and control functions related to deposit business, ensuring fund security.

functions.title: Anti-Fraud Strategy Management
functions.description: Maintains anti-fraud strategy information, bypass strategies, and strategy change records.

functions.title: Real-Time Fraud Detection and Identification
functions.description: Manages anti-fraud services, provides anti-fraud decision-making services, and intercepts high-risk fraudulent activities.

functions.title: Fraud Strategy Change Verification Management
functions.description: Manages strategy bypass verification and A/B testing.

functions.title: Metric Calculation
functions.description: Provides general near real-time and T+1 metric calculation capabilities.

functions.title: List Management
functions.description: Manages lists from various sources (e.g., external and internal lists), supporting operations like adding and deleting.

functions.title: Detection Rule Management
functions.description: Configures hit rules for different list groups (e.g., sanctions, terrorist lists, red notices) such as name and address match thresholds and conditions.

functions.title: List Search
functions.description: Provides list searches across dimensions such as name, address, country, account, ID information, notes, and remarks.

modules.name: Foreign Exchange
modules.description: Supports functions related to multi-currency deposits, currency exchange, and foreign exchange transactions.

functions.title: Channel, Data & Price Source Access
functions.description: Manages access to external market data and price sources.

functions.title: Market & Price Management
functions.description: Cleans and aggregates external market data, maintains price data, and distributes it across multiple channels to support trading.

functions.title: Spread Management
functions.description: Supports multi-dimensional spread management according to pricing strategies, flexible multi-panel configurations, and enable/disable functions.

functions.title: Trade Management
functions.description: Includes customer trades, internal trades, and interbank trade recording and tracking.

functions.title: Accounting Management
functions.description: Handles accounting related to foreign exchange transactions and supports reconciliation between channels and core systems.

functions.title: Report Management
functions.description: Computes, displays, and tracks exposures, P&L, and other metrics from FX trading.

modules.name: Finance
modules.description: Responsible for core financial functions including general ledger management, accounting operations, and liquidity risk management.

functions.title: Organization Management
functions.description: Maintains organizational information, standardizing and regulating management across legal entities.

functions.title: Account Set Management
functions.description: Maintains account set information, allowing each to independently record accounting vouchers under different accounting systems and requirements.

functions.title: Value Set Management
functions.description: Maintains value set field information related to business, including definitions and items.

functions.title: Multi-Dimensional Management
functions.description: Manages multi-dimensional segments of the general ledger account set, enabling multi-dimensional queries and meeting downstream statistical analysis needs.

functions.title: Period Management
functions.description: Maintains general ledger accounting period settings, ensuring periodic and timely financial reporting.

functions.title: Foreign Currency Management
functions.description: Maintains original currency settings in the general ledger, supports querying, adding, and modifying.

functions.title: Journal Entry Input
functions.description: Allows manual entry, query, viewing, addition, modification, reversal, copying, deletion, import, and export of general ledger journal entries.

functions.title: Journal Entry Query
functions.description: Enables journal entry queries, Excel export, PDF export, and email delivery.

functions.title: Report Query
functions.description: Provides queries and exports for basic reports such as status reports, balance sheets, and income statements.

functions.title: Liquidity Forecasting
functions.description: Uses historical data and business scenario modeling to predict future cash inflow/outflow gaps.

functions.title: Real-Time Monitoring
functions.description: Tracks key indicators, large transaction dynamics, and market liquidity changes via dashboard for risk visualization.

functions.title: Position Alerting
functions.description: Sets multi-level threshold triggers to intelligently alert and push notifications for risk events like abnormal account balances or excessive term mismatches.

functions.title: Transaction Control Management
functions.description: Implements channel transaction limit management, large transaction approval flow control, and liquidity protection mechanisms during special periods; dynamically adjusts fund flow scales.

modules.name: Data Management
modules.description: Provides unified capabilities for data distribution, data warehouse modeling, and metric management.

functions.title: Data Transfer Management
functions.description: Supports data pushing across databases (e.g., TDSL to Hive or TiDB); provides counter-side configurable access; ensures general data validation and table splitting.

functions.title: Standard Model
functions.description: Builds unified data standards; uses layered modeling (ODS/DWD/DWS/ADS) to standardize subject domain data, ensuring consistency, reusability, and scalability.

functions.title: Data Splitting
functions.description: Supports data splitting across different dimensions (product, channel) and data permission management.

functions.title: Metric Management
functions.description: Defines calculation logic for atomic and derived indicators, supporting KPI statistics and analysis for deposit business.
